assignment.name: For : 3) Sum of even/odd in a range

files.name: main.py
files.content:
StrtNum = int (input ("Starting number?"))

while (True):
    EndNum = int (input ("Ending number?"))
    if (EndNum <= StrtNum):
        print ("Ending number must be greater than", StrtNum)
        continue
    else:
        break 

print ("")
print ("In the range", StrtNum, "to", EndNum)

NumberofEven=0
NumberofOdd=0
SUm1=0
SUm2=0
for counter in range (StrtNum, EndNum+1):
    if (counter==0): continue
    Floor=counter % 2
    if (Floor==0):
        SUm1=(SUm1+counter)
        NumberofEven=(NumberofEven+1)
        
    if (Floor!=0):
        SUm2= (SUm2+counter)
        NumberofOdd=(NumberofOdd+1)

print ("There are",NumberofEven, "even numbers with a sum of", SUm1)
print ("There are",NumberofOdd, "odd numbers with a sum of", SUm2)
#for x in range (StartNum, EndNum+1):
    #total= ( total + x )
